comments: Hard as hell but worth it! There\'s no grey area with her. You do your work or you don\'t and you get the grade you earned and she doesn\'t take it personally. If she thinks you aren\'t trying, you will get nothing from her, but if she sees you are trying with all you\'ve got, no matter what your grades are, she will go to the ends of the earth to help!

Mrs. Solomon is nice and classy teacher..Just do your work and you will be fine. She shows some attitude sometimes if she doesn\'t like you. All she wants to see from you is hard work....Show her you work really hard and you will be fine. She is friendly and cowgirl..she love her dogs and her country lifestyle. She is good and helpful

Don\'t let the smooth taste full ya!!! She is fair and she will flunk you fast. Do all your homework..do good on all tests..and turn in all projects at the end of the semester. PROFECTION is what she expects.
